verses.verse: Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, cause Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8685><s%> her abominations <S%H8441><s%>,

And say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> unto Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>; Thy birth <S%H4351><s%> and thy nativity <S%H4138><s%> is of the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3669><s%>; thy father <S%H1><s%> was an Amorite <S%H567><s%>, and thy mother <S%H517><s%> an Hittite <S%H2850><s%>.

And as for thy nativity <S%H4138><s%>, in the day <S%H3117><s%> thou wast born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8715><s%> thy navel <S%H8270><s%> was not cut <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8795><s%>, neither wast thou washed <S%H7364><s%> <S%H8795><s%> in water <S%H4325><s%> to supple <S%H4935><s%> thee; thou wast not salted <S%H4414><s%> <S%H8717><s%> at all <S%H4414><s%> <S%H8715><s%>, nor swaddled <S%H2853><s%> <S%H8795><s%> at all <S%H2853><s%> <S%H8715><s%>.

None eye <S%H5869><s%> pitied <S%H2347><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee, to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> any <S%H259><s%> of these unto thee, to have compassion <S%H2550><s%> <S%H8800><s%> upon thee; but thou wast cast out <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8714><s%> in the open <S%H6440><s%> field <S%H7704><s%>, to the lothing <S%H1604><s%> of thy person <S%H5315><s%>, in the day <S%H3117><s%> that thou wast born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8715><s%>.

And when I passed <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by thee, and saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee polluted <S%H947><s%> <S%H8711><s%> in thine own blood <S%H1818><s%>, I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thee when thou wast in thy blood <S%H1818><s%>, Live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; yea, I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thee when thou wast in thy blood <S%H1818><s%>, Live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8798><s%>.

I have caused <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee to multiply <S%H7233><s%> as the bud <S%H6780><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, and thou hast increased <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and waxen great <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and thou art come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to excellent <S%H5716><s%> ornaments <S%H5716><s%>: thy breasts <S%H7699><s%> are fashioned <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and thine hair <S%H8181><s%> is grown <S%H6779><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, whereas thou wast naked <S%H5903><s%> and bare <S%H6181><s%>.

Now when I passed <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by thee, and looked <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon thee, behold, thy time <S%H6256><s%> was the time <S%H6256><s%> of love <S%H1730><s%>; and I spread <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my skirt <S%H3671><s%> over thee, and covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thy nakedness <S%H6172><s%>: yea, I sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto thee, and entered <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with thee, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, and thou becamest mine.

Then washed <S%H7364><s%> <S%H8799><s%> I thee with water <S%H4325><s%>; yea, I throughly washed away <S%H7857><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy blood <S%H1818><s%> from thee, and I anointed <S%H5480><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee with oil <S%H8081><s%>.

I clothed <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee also with broidered work <S%H7553><s%>, and shod <S%H5274><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee with badgers' skin <S%H8476><s%>, and I girded <S%H2280><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee about with fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and I covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee with silk <S%H4897><s%>.

I decked <S%H5710><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee also with ornaments <S%H5716><s%>, and I put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> bracelets <S%H6781><s%> upon thy hands <S%H3027><s%>, and a chain <S%H7242><s%> on thy neck <S%H1627><s%>.

And I put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a jewel <S%H5141><s%> on thy forehead <S%H639><s%>, and earrings <S%H5694><s%> in thine ears <S%H241><s%>, and a beautiful <S%H8597><s%> crown <S%H5850><s%> upon thine head <S%H7218><s%>.

Thus wast thou decked <S%H5710><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver <S%H3701><s%>; and thy raiment <S%H4403><s%> was of fine linen <S%H8336><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H8336><s%>, and silk <S%H4897><s%>, and broidered work <S%H7553><s%>; thou didst eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> fine flour <S%H5560><s%>, and honey <S%H1706><s%>, and oil <S%H8081><s%>: and thou wast exceeding <S%H3966><s%> beautiful <S%H3302><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and thou didst prosper <S%H6743><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into a kingdom <S%H4410><s%>.

And thy renown <S%H8034><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%> for thy beauty <S%H3308><s%>: for it was perfect <S%H3632><s%> through my comeliness <S%H1926><s%>, which I had put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon thee, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

But thou didst trust <S%H982><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in thine own beauty <S%H3308><s%>, and playedst the harlot <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8799><s%> because of thy renown <S%H8034><s%>, and pouredst out <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy fornications <S%H8457><s%> on every one that passed by <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; his it was.

And of thy garments <S%H899><s%> thou didst take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and deckedst <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy high places <S%H1116><s%> with divers colours <S%H2921><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, and playedst the harlot <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thereupon: the like things shall not come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, neither shall it be so.

Thou hast also taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy fair <S%H8597><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> of my gold <S%H2091><s%> and of my silver <S%H3701><s%>, which I had given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee, and madest <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to thyself images <S%H6754><s%> of men <S%H2145><s%>, and didst commit whoredom <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with them,

And tookest <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy broidered <S%H7553><s%> garments <S%H899><s%>, and coveredst <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them: and thou hast set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> mine oil <S%H8081><s%> and mine incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

My meat <S%H3899><s%> also which I gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee, fine flour <S%H5560><s%>, and oil <S%H8081><s%>, and honey <S%H1706><s%>, wherewith I fed <S%H398><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee, thou hast even set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> them for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%>: and thus it was, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

Moreover thou hast taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy sons <S%H1121><s%> and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%>, whom thou hast borne <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me, and these hast thou sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them to be devoured <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%>. Is this of thy whoredoms <S%H8457><s%> a small matter <S%H4592><s%>,
That thou hast slain <S%H7819><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my children <S%H1121><s%>, and delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them to cause them to pass through <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the fire for them?

And in all thine abominations <S%H8441><s%> and thy whoredoms <S%H8457><s%> thou hast not remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy youth <S%H5271><s%>, when thou wast naked <S%H5903><s%> and bare <S%H6181><s%>, and wast polluted <S%H947><s%> <S%H8711><s%> in thy blood <S%H1818><s%>.
And it came to pass after <S%H310><s%> all thy wickedness <S%H7451><s%>, (woe <S%H188><s%>, woe <S%H188><s%> unto thee! saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>;)

That thou hast also built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thee an eminent place <S%H1354><s%>, and hast made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee an high place <S%H7413><s%> in every street <S%H7339><s%>.

Thou hast built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy high place <S%H7413><s%> at every head <S%H7218><s%> of the way <S%H1870><s%>, and hast made thy beauty <S%H3308><s%> to be abhorred <S%H8581><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, and hast opened <S%H6589><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thy feet <S%H7272><s%> to every one that passed by <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and multiplied <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thy whoredoms <S%H8457><s%>.

Thou hast also committed fornication <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the Egyptians <S%H1121><s%> <S%H4714><s%> thy neighbours <S%H7934><s%>, great <S%H1432><s%> of flesh <S%H1320><s%>; and hast increased <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thy whoredoms <S%H8457><s%>, to provoke me to anger <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8687><s%>.

Behold, therefore I have stretched out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> over thee, and have diminished <S%H1639><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thine ordinary <S%H2706><s%> food, and delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee unto the will <S%H5315><s%> of them that hate <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee, the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, which are ashamed <S%H3637><s%> <S%H8737><s%> of thy lewd <S%H2154><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>.

Thou hast played the whore <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8799><s%> also with the Ashurns <S%H1121><s%> <S%H804><s%>, because <S%H1115><s%> thou wast unsatiable <S%H7646><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; yea, thou hast played the harlot <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with them, and yet couldest not be satisfied <S%H7654><s%>.

Thou hast moreover multiplied <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thy fornication <S%H8457><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%> unto Chaldea <S%H3778><s%>; and yet thou wast not satisfied <S%H7646><s%> <S%H8804><s%> herewith <S%H2063><s%>.

How weak <S%H535><s%> <S%H8802><s%> is thine heart <S%H3826><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, seeing thou doest <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> all these things, the work <S%H4639><s%> of an imperious <S%H7986><s%> whorish <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8803><s%> woman <S%H802><s%>;

In that thou buildest <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thine eminent place <S%H1354><s%> in the head <S%H7218><s%> of every way <S%H1870><s%>, and makest <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thine high place <S%H7413><s%> in every street <S%H7339><s%>; and hast not been as an harlot <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, in that thou scornest <S%H7046><s%> <S%H8763><s%> hire <S%H868><s%>;
But as a wife <S%H802><s%> that committeth adultery <S%H5003><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, which taketh <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> strangers <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%> instead of her husband <S%H376><s%> !

They give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> gifts <S%H5078><s%> to all whores <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: but thou givest <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy gifts <S%H5083><s%> to all thy lovers <S%H157><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, and hirest <S%H7809><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, that they may come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto thee on every side <S%H5439><s%> for thy whoredom <S%H8457><s%>.

And the contrary <S%H2016><s%> is in thee from other women <S%H802><s%> in thy whoredoms <S%H8457><s%>, whereas none followeth <S%H310><s%> thee to commit whoredoms <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8795><s%>: and in that thou givest <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> a reward <S%H868><s%>, and no reward <S%H868><s%> is given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto thee, therefore thou art <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8799><s%> contrary <S%H2016><s%>.
Wherefore, O harlot <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>:

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Because thy filthiness <S%H5178><s%> was poured out <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8736><s%>, and thy nakedness <S%H6172><s%> discovered <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8735><s%> through thy whoredoms <S%H8457><s%> with thy lovers <S%H157><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, and with all the idols <S%H1544><s%> of thy abominations <S%H8441><s%>, and by the blood <S%H1818><s%> of thy children <S%H1121><s%>, which thou didst give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them;

Behold, therefore I will gather <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8764><s%> all thy lovers <S%H157><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, with whom thou hast taken pleasure <S%H6149><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and all them that thou hast loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, with all them that thou hast hated <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; I will even gather <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them round about <S%H5439><s%> against thee, and will discover <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thy nakedness <S%H6172><s%> unto them, that they may see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all thy nakedness <S%H6172><s%>.

And I will judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee, as women that break wedlock <S%H5003><s%> <S%H8802><s%> and shed <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8802><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> are judged <S%H4941><s%>; and I will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee blood <S%H1818><s%> in fury <S%H2534><s%> and jealousy <S%H7068><s%>.

And I will also give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee into their hand <S%H3027><s%>, and they shall throw down <S%H2040><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thine eminent place <S%H1354><s%>, and shall break down <S%H5422><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thy high places <S%H7413><s%>: they shall strip <S%H6584><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee also of thy clothes <S%H899><s%>, and shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy fair <S%H8597><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%>, and leave <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee naked <S%H5903><s%> and bare <S%H6181><s%>.

They shall also bring up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%> a company <S%H6951><s%> against thee, and they shall stone <S%H7275><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee with stones <S%H68><s%>, and thrust thee through <S%H1333><s%> <S%H8765><s%> with their swords <S%H2719><s%>.

And they shall burn <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thine houses <S%H1004><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>, and execute <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> upon thee in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> women <S%H802><s%>: and I will cause thee to cease <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from playing the harlot <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and thou also shalt give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no hire <S%H868><s%> any more.

So will I make my fury <S%H2534><s%> toward thee to rest <S%H5117><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> shall depart <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from thee, and I will be quiet <S%H8252><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and will be no more angry <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Because thou hast not remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy youth <S%H5271><s%>, but hast fretted <S%H7264><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me in all these things; behold <S%H1887><s%>, therefore I also will recompense <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy way <S%H1870><s%> upon thine head <S%H7218><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>: and thou shalt not commit <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this lewdness <S%H2154><s%> above all thine abominations <S%H8441><s%>.

Behold, every one that useht proverbs <S%H4911><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall use this proverb <S%H4911><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against thee, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, As is the mother <S%H517><s%>, so is her daughter <S%H1323><s%>.

Thou art thy mother's <S%H517><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%>, that lotheth <S%H1602><s%> <S%H8802><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%> and her children <S%H1121><s%>; and thou art the sister <S%H269><s%> of thy sisters <S%H269><s%>, which lothed <S%H1602><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their husbands <S%H582><s%> and their children <S%H1121><s%>: your mother <S%H517><s%> was an Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, and your father <S%H1><s%> an Amorite <S%H567><s%>.

And thine elder <S%H1419><s%> sister <S%H269><s%> is SHomron <S%H8111><s%>, she and her daughters <S%H1323><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> at thy left hand <S%H8040><s%>: and thy younger <S%H6996><s%> sister <S%H269><s%>, that dwelleth <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> at thy right hand <S%H3225><s%>, is Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and her daughters <S%H1323><s%>.

Yet hast thou not walked <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> after their ways <S%H1870><s%>, nor done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> after their abominations <S%H8441><s%>: but, as if that were a very <S%H6985><s%> little <S%H4592><s%> <S%H6962><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thing, thou wast corrupted <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8686><s%> more than they <S%H2004><s%> in all thy ways <S%H1870><s%>.

As I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, Sodom <S%H5467><s%> thy sister <S%H269><s%> hath not done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, she nor her daughters <S%H1323><s%>, as thou hast done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, thou and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%>.
